attributes.action: The Church of England should support same sex marriage.
attributes.additional_details: agree that if the church of England chooses who can love each other but yet still expects support and funding, most liking out of our gay hard earned cash that gose to the tax man. If the Church of England will not commit to  equal rights for all including gay! then we do not support the church of England, We will not donate or allow any of our money to support it . You cannot pick and choose who you love and you certainly shouldn't be told that you cannot get married in your church in England.
attributes.background:
Church of our England voted not to "take note" of a controversial report on homosexuality and same-sex marriage.
a "culture of welcome and support" for gay Christians.

marriage in church should only be between a man and a woman, and services should not be held to bless same-sex.

rejection.details: This is a matter for the Church of England, not the Government or Parliament.
